chat.title: Support Chat
chat.welcomeMessage: 👋 Hello! Welcome to TurboPlay Support! How can I help you today?
chat.response1: 🎰 If you have issues with spinning, please check if you have already spun today. You can spin once every 24 hours!
chat.response2: 🎁 Your bonus will be automatically applied when you use the promocode at our partner casino! If you need help with the code, just ask.
chat.response3: 🌍 We support multiple currencies and languages. Your location is automatically detected for the best experience! If you want to change language or currency, use the selectors at the top.
chat.response4: 💫 The wheel uses fair probability algorithms to ensure every spin is random and exciting! Good luck!
chat.response5: 📱 This website works perfectly on mobile devices. Try spinning on your phone for a great experience!
chat.response6: ⭐ Thank you for using TurboPlay! If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know. We're here to help!
